name: NaNoRoBoTs
description:
[NaNoRoBoTs] [Story]

In the Future, 93.1% of computers may be affected by virus that made by international alien...

Alright, the professional scientist tries to make antivirus thing, but he got idea what he makes it SMALLER and names it "Nano-Robots". Replaces it into USB, and scientist plugs affected computer to test to what happen...

Ofc, everyone knows before happended what thoughts scientist sucks... [Controls]

Arrows - Bot Moving

[Guide] Your goal is only attaching on decrypt!

However, the game has an energy consumer! If the bot move one step, it costs 1, and if it pushes a box(-es), it costs N+1, where N is boxes pushed by the bot.

If ran out of energies, game over! Forgot to say, goal requires decrypt(-s) only connected by bot(-s).

This is ice, if the bot steps on ice, it can move freely without consuming until step in solid.

Pressing the button "Reset" to reload the current level, maybe if you ran out of energies, trying to reach goal.

[Conclusion]

Sorry, what game has no audio because I can't hear/understand about audio :(
And also sorry, what I busy to make things outside development as many times...
